name: Heavy Crosswind Landings and Takeoffs on Runway 29 at Calgary International Airport ᴴᴰ
description:
With all the crosswind action that we had in October, I knew I had to make the most of it with a compilation of some of our heavies on Calgary's crosswind runway! Here we have a couple of Calgary's regular heavy arrivals and departures using our 8,000 foot crosswind runway which offers a lot more unique viewpoints than the parallels do. ATC is included for all aircraft, hope you enjoy these 10+ minutes of crosswind action!

I also met a fantastic aviation videographer that day, uniteddeltafan! Go check out his channel: https://youtube.com/uniteddeltafan

Thanks for watching!

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

FLIGHT INFO
#1: Air Transat A330-200 - "Transat 577 heavy" - LGW-YYC 
#2: Air Canada 767-300ER - "Air Canada 144 heavy" - YYC-YYZ
#3: KLM 787-9 Dreamliner  - "KLM 677 heavy" - AMS-YYC 
#4: Air Transat A330-200 - "Transat 577 heavy" - YYC-YVR
#5: Air Canada 777-200LR - "Air Canada 845 heavy" - FRA-YYC
